attributes.action: Low cost dental implants for elderly on nhs
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to discuss the elderly population over 60 being able to have dental implants on the nhs dental service to enable them to have some dignity in there twilight years instead of wasting money on unwearable dentures which should now be a thing of the past with the capabilities now available.
Not just for the select few who funding these are know problem as the saying goes look outside the box.
